subject: Tonight on Inside Sport

INSIDE SPORT PRESENTER GABBY LOGAN
Hi everyone, Gabby here.


We've got a special edition of Inside Sport for you this Monday night - it's an exclusive interview with the former England manager, Sven-Goran Eriksson.  


It's his first British TV interview since he left the job and there are a lot of questions to ask him.  


I'll be asking him about his time with England and what he thinks about the current team; about the way he became a target of press attention; about the Premiership, David Beckham, the Champions League final and, of course, what's in store next for Sven himself.


So join me tonight on BBC ONE at 2305 BST for a Sventastic edition of Inside Sport.


Gabby hosts Inside Sport on Monday 21 May, 2305 BST on BBC ONE, and the second edition, Sunday 27 May, 1130 BST on BBC TWO.
